CustomField.formula: IF(Portfolio_from_Quote_Line_Item__c = "Modular Private Wireless Solution",IF(is_Custom_Product__c ==false,IF(TEXT(Apttus_Config2__LineType__c) = "Product/Service",Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.NokiaCPQ_Product_Discount_Category__c,IF( AND(Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Product_Discount_Category__c <>Apttus_Config2__ProductOptionId__r.Apttus_Config2__ParentProductId__r.NokiaCPQ_Product_Discount_Category__c,Apttus_Config2__ProductOptionId__r.Apttus_Config2__ParentProductId__r.Name <> "Modular Private Wireless Network Solution"),Apttus_Config2__ProductOptionId__r.Apttus_Config2__ParentProductId__r.NokiaCPQ_Product_Discount_Category__c,Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Product_Discount_Category__c)),NokiaCPQ_CustomProductPDC__c ),IF(is_Custom_Product__c ==false,IF(TEXT(Apttus_Config2__LineType__c) = "Product/Service",Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.NokiaCPQ_Product_Discount_Category__c,Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Product_Discount_Category__c), NokiaCPQ_CustomProductPDC__c ))
CustomField.label: Product Discount Category
